index_header2: Join us in our quest to make the web more transparent and better aligned with the interests of all people
index_manifesto_content1: The internet has lost our trust. Links are broken, images don’t load, navigation is difficult... but the problems go deeper. Large corporations have taken control of a once open system. They have built powerful and private systems for their own benefit, amplifying our basest impulses and fears to drive clicks, contributing to a polarized climate where even basic facts cannot be agreed upon.
index_manifesto_content2: We need an online culture guided by a spirit of transparency and civility, built by and for humans. More Human Internet aims to provide a space for citizens of the web to be heard. We believe the existence of this online space will change how websites are built and how humans interact with them.
index_manifesto_content3: Let's create a More Human Internet.
index_aboutus1: More Human Internet is a non-profit organization of digital activists using web technologies to promote civility, transparency, and the greater good.
index_aboutus4: a free, open source browser extension that automatically captures a snapshot of any online issue and addresses a tweet to the site's maintainer.
index_aboutus7: like-minded web citizens to help spearhead this effort.
index_weneedyou2: We are assembling an inclusive team of motivated and talented volunteers to build this public platform and collaborative community. If you value teamwork and believe in this mission, we would love to work with you.
index_why1: The internet has lost our trust. Large corporations have taken control of a once open system. They have built powerful and private systems that prioritize clicks over civility and revenue over reason, leading to a polarized climate where even basic facts cannot be agreed upon.
index_why2: We need an online culture guided by a spirit of transparency and civility, built by and for humans. More Human Internet is building open source applications in pursuit of that vision. We aim to change how websites are created and how humans interact with them for good.
index_why3: Let's build a More Human Internet.
showcase_content1_description: People can post issues they encounter online
showcase_content2_description: People can have conversations with website maintainers
showcase_content3_description: Maintainers may track progress and sort issues by how many people are experiencing them
